      • clearDependencies

        void clearDependencies()
        Clear dependencies

      • clearBuildArtifacts

        void clearBuildArtifacts()
        Clear local BuildArtifacts

      • addBuildArtifact

        void addBuildArtifact(String notation,
                      String path,
                      String pom)
        Add a local Build Artifact manually by String notation, path to the artifact, and path to the POM. The Build Artifact will override matchingdependencies found when resolving dependencies.
        Parameters:
        notation - String
        path - String
        pom - String

      • addBuildArtifact

        void addBuildArtifact(String notation,
                      String path)
               throws NaetherException
        Add a local Build Artifact manually by String notation and path to the artifact. The POM for the artifact is created automatically based on the String notation. The Build Artifact will override matchingdependencies found when resolving dependencies.
        Parameters:
        notation - String
        path - String
        Throws:
        NaetherException - if failed to create a POM

      • addDependency

        void addDependency(String notation)
        Add dependency by String notation with default compile scope groupId:artifactId:type:version
        Parameters:
        notation - String

      • addDependency

        void addDependency(String notation,
                   String scope)
        Add dependency by String notation and Maven scope groupId:artifactId:type:version
        Parameters:
        notation - String
        scope - String

                     List<String> scopes)
              throws ProjectException
        Add dependencies from a Maven POM, limited to a List of scopes.
        Parameters:
        pomPath - String path to POM
        scopes - List of scopes

              throws ProjectException

        Parameters:
        project - Project
        Throws:
        ProjectException - exception

      • addDependencies

        void addDependencies(Project project,
                     List<String> scopes)
              throws ProjectException
        Add dependencies from a Maven POM, limited to a List of scopes. Adds all Repositories from the Maven Pom.
        Parameters:
        project - Project
        scopes - List of dependency scopes
        Throws:
        ProjectException - exception

      • install

        void install(String notation,
             String pomPath,
             String filePath)
      throws InstallException
        Install Artifact to local repo. If installing a POM, filePath can be null. If install a Jar without a POM, pomPath can be null.
        Parameters:
        notation - String
        pomPath - String
        filePath - String
        Throws:
        InstallException - exception

      • currentDependencies

        Collection<org.sonatype.aether.graph.Dependency> currentDependencies()
        Get the current dependencies. Returns Collection of resolved Dependencies if resolveDependencies() has been called, other returns getDependencies()
        Returns:
        Collection
